full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG @010A *, ,SEMS CAN RNAMS LA, MI DANG MI MIN GYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA, ,RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG RUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG DAD PA DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAMS DPYOD YANGS PA THU SHE YE GUNG KHUN TI LING TUR GI CHI RIN CHEN RDO RJE DON DU, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
